solution_line_template: He has {num_horses} horses, {num_dogs} dogs, {num_cats} cats, {num_turtles} turtles and {num_goat} goat so in total he has {num_horses}+{num_dogs}+{num_cats}+{num_turtles}+{num_goat} = <<{num_horses}+{num_dogs}+{num_cats}+{num_turtles}+{num_goat}={total_animals}>>{total_animals} animal
Each animal has {legs_per_animal} legs so {total_animals}*{legs_per_animal} = <<{total_animals}*{legs_per_animal}={total_legs}>>{total_legs} legs total
